snippet: A North Texas high school football team has secured a spot in the playoffs thanks to a winning coin flip at a fast-food burger restaurant.
abstract: Timberview High School football team in North Texas heads to Class 5A Division II playoffs after winning tie-breaking coin toss.
lead_paragraph: A North Texas high school football team has secured a spot in the playoffs thanks to a winning coin flip at a fast-food burger restaurant.

headline.main: Playoff Berth Is Decided at Whataburger
